availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of Sallie M. Lyle. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, p. 30.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, Christianburg, p. 458.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film 000259275.
"Joshua R. Lyle (1809-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 44638690, accessed September 26, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44638690.
